---
title: "protocol_24"
---

First version of the screen protocol. The structure was based on protocol 19. This protocol includes a variety of optomotor gratings, curtain stimuli, reverse phi motion, and flicker patterns to comprehensively assess visual responses in freely-walking flies.

## Protocol Parameters

| Parameter | Value |
|:----------|:------|
| Conditions | 10 |
| Patterns Used | 9 |
| t_acclim_start | 300s |
| t_acclim_end | 30s |
| t_interval | 20s |
| t_flash | 5s |
| t_pause | 0.01 |


## Conditions

| # | Pattern | Speed | Duration | Description |
|--:|:--------|------:|---------:|:------------|
| 1 | [Pattern 9](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_09.qmd) | 127 | 15s | 60 deg gratings - 4Hz - 1 px step pattern |
| 2 | [Pattern 27](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_27.qmd) | 127 | 15s | 60 deg gratings - 8Hz - 2px step pattern |
| 3 | [Pattern 17](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_17.qmd) | 127 | 15s | 2:14 ON bars - 4Hz |
| 4 | [Pattern 24](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_24.qmd) | 127 | 15s | 2:14 OFF bars - 4Hz |
| 5 | [Pattern 19](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_19.qmd) | 127 | 15s | ON curtains - 8Hz |
| 6 | [Pattern 20](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_20.qmd) | 127 | 15s | OFF curtains - 8Hz |
| 7 | [Pattern 32](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_32.qmd) | 16 | 15s | Reverse Phi - 4px step - 4Hz |
| 8 | [Pattern 32](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_32.qmd) | 32 | 15s | Reverse Phi - 4px step - 8Hz |
| 9 | [Pattern 10](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_10.qmd) | 8 | 15s | Flicker - 4Hz |
| 10 | [Pattern 10](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_10.qmd) | 16 | 15s | Flicker - 8Hz |
| Interval | [Pattern 47](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_47.qmd) | N/A | 20s | Dark interval pattern |
